name: National Geographic Jasper South Trail Map
description: Based on GeoBase data and data from Natural Resources Canada, these high-quality National Geographic illustrated maps are revised regularly in co-operation with Parks Canada. Printed on synthetic paper that's waterproof and tear-resistant, the map holds up to handling and repeated use. This version includes trail distances for the South Boundary, Athabasca Pass, Maligne Lake, Tonquin Valley, and Hamber Provincial Park. Approximate scale is 1:100,000.
